name: Rube Goldberg Machine Bowen
description:
Hi, this is Bowen, and this is my CS-UY 3113 exercise 1.

It is a Rube Goldberg Machine consist of dominos, colliders, and bounce boards.

The reason why I finally export it as a "PC, Mac&Linus Standalone" format rather than a WebGL is that my project won't work on WebGL format. Maybe is the file conversion problem, the bouncing ball just not going to the right place as I set, the path it moves is slightly different from the path I can see in the Game view window. As a result, the project cannot be run in the way it should be...  I tried many times to fix this but I didn't make it, so I tried changing the export format and it worked. So I will probably submit two formats in Gradescope for grading, WebGl and PC, Mac&Linus Standalone. You can check for the proper animation by downloading the file below

I am really sorry for the inconvenience I created, but professor, please understand my situation, it is so far the only way I can do to make sure the project can work properly. Hope I won't get any point deducted for this...

Bowen Gong
